_header: I am he that will not flee
_description: English couplet translating ‘Ego sum illy quy non youlte fugere da mychi bacoulum par carytatye’

CULAdd3042.Transcription: I am he that wylnot sleGyfe me a stafe for charyte
CULAdd3042.Note:
Followed by the Latin of which it is a translation; added by a
                    fifteenth-century hand to a blank folio at the beginning of the
                    volume.

CULEe228.Transcription: I am he that wyl not flyeGyue me a draffe ffor charytye
CULEe228.Note: Added to top margin; Robert Browne, scribe, f. 36.
